title: Boards, make up your damn mind

replies.body: That's the problem with people with biased opinions. Like some hate assassins; I think almost every assassin is pretty weak unless they get a huge lead, but people will call me stupid because i don't agree with their opinions. i'd much rather face any assassin right now than let's say... Syndra.

In a game with a lot of champions, the balance isn't ever going to be right. I'm on the side with assassins being poorly designed. When ahead, they make it so that one person doesn't get to play the game, plus a lot of extra damage on other targets. I'm fine with them deleting someone and all, but the fact that they tend to act more of a sustained damage dealer with occasional burst isn't fun. Now, on the inverse, if they are behind, THEY ARE BEHIND. 

Some assassins aren't fun to play against, Leblanc, I'm looking at you. And you're right, mages were okay, but people wanted to play assassins more than mages, and mages have an inherent disadvantage there. The majority of the player base just wants a balanced game, but that's hard to do in this. There will always be people complaining, but there's nothing wrong as long as there is evidence.
that's kind of what keeps this game interesting....

DON'T YOU TELL ME HOW TO LIVE MY LIFE

_flips table_
